home.registrationSubTitle: Enter your mobile number and book an appointment at your nearest facility center
home.registrationInfo: An OTP will be sent to you for verification

infoCard.title: Book Appointment or Walkin
infoCard.subTitle: Search for the nearest facility center

homeCard.title: Download your Vaccination Certificate
homeCard.subTitle: You would need your unique id and Mobile number to verify OTP in order to access your digital certificate.

homeCard.title: Verify your Vaccination Certificate
homeCard.subTitle: Ensure that your vaccination certificate is a authentic by digitally verifying it here.

homeCard.title: Report symptoms
homeCard.subTitle: By reporting any side-effects of the vaccine, you will ensure the safety of others in the community and help the government contain the pandemic effectively.

login.title: Registration and Appointment Portal

success.enrollmentDetails: Enrolment details will be sent to

success.title: Successfully booked appointment for {{program}}
success.enrollmentDetails: Appointment details will be sent to the registered mobile number and/or email.

sideEffect.title: Report symptoms
sideEffect.subTitle: By reporting any side-effects of the vaccine, you will ensure the safety of others in the community and help the government contain the pandemic effectively.

submitSymptom.title: Can you help us identify the patient with these symptoms
submitSymptom.confirmationMsg: I confirm that this patient is having the identified symptoms
submitSymptom.completeMsgTitle: The healthcare facility has been notified. You will receive a call back soon.
submitSymptom.completeMsgTitle2: If the symptoms worsen, please visit the facility so that the doctors can attend to at the earliest.
submitSymptom.completeMsgSubTitle: If you need to contact the facility immediately

certificateView.title: Vaccination certificate
certificateView.subTitle: There are multiple certificates associated with phone : {{mobileNumber}}

verifyCertificate.title: Verify DIVOC Verifiable Certificate
verifyCertificate.invalidText: This certificate is not issued by the DIVOC VC Issuance platform
verifyCertificate.contactForDetails: Kindly contact the issuing authority for this certificate to know more details
verifyCertificate.timeoutTitle: Camera is not able to read the QR code, please try again
timeoutInfoList: QR code should cover at-least 70%-80% of screen
Complete QR code should be part of camera frame
QR code is  parallel to the camera
Camera is held steadily for at-least 5 seconds
The QR code area is clean, not crumbled, and not tampered
The contrast of your screen is not too low

errors.selectComorbidity: * Please select at least one comorbidity
errors.invalidBeneficiary: Sorry, the beneficiary is currently not eligible to register for the {{program}} program
errors.duplicateNationalIdErr: * Beneficiary with this ID already exists
errors.nameMinLength: * Name should have at least 1 characters
errors.nameAlphabetOnly: * Beneficiary Name should have only alphabets
errors.nameDuplicate: * Beneficiary with same Name and Age already exists
